SPAudioParam.name: SPAudioParam
SPAudioParam.description: Mock AudioParam for external use on Models.

classitems.description: Schedules a parameter value change at the given time.
classitems.name: setValueAtTime

params.name: value
params.description: The value parameter is the value the parameter will change to at the given time.

params.name: startTime
params.description: The startTime parameter is the time in the same time coordinate system as AudioContext.currentTime.

classitems.description:
Start exponentially approaching the target value at the given time with a rate having the given time constant.

During the time interval: T0 <= t < T1, where T0 is the startTime parameter and T1 represents the time of the event following this event (or infinity if there are no following events):
       v(t) = V1 + (V0 - V1) * exp(-(t - T0) / timeConstant)
classitems.name: setTargetAtTime

params.name: target
params.description: The target parameter is the value the parameter will start changing to at the given time.

params.name: startTime
params.description: The startTime parameter is the time in the same time coordinate system as AudioContext.currentTime.

params.name: timeConstant
params.description: The timeConstant parameter is the time-constant value of first-order filter (exponential) approach to the target value. The larger this value is, the slower the transition will be.

classitems.description:
Sets an array of arbitrary parameter values starting at the given time for the given duration. The number of values will be scaled to fit into the desired duration.

During the time interval: startTime <= t < startTime + duration, values will be calculated:

      v(t) = values[N * (t - startTime) / duration], where N is the length of the values array.
classitems.name: setTargetValueAtTime

params.name: values
params.description: The values parameter is a Float32Array representing a parameter value curve. These values will apply starting at the given time and lasting for the given duration.

params.name: startTime
params.description: The startTime parameter is the time in the same time coordinate system as AudioContext.currentTime.

params.name: duration
params.description: The duration parameter is the amount of time in seconds (after the time parameter) where values will be calculated according to the values parameter.

classitems.description:
Sets an array of arbitrary parameter values starting at the given time for the given duration. The number of values will be scaled to fit into the desired duration.

During the time interval: startTime <= t < startTime + duration, values will be calculated:

      v(t) = values[N * (t - startTime) / duration], where N is the length of the values array.
classitems.name: setValueCurveAtTime

params.name: values
params.description: The values parameter is a Float32Array representing a parameter value curve. These values will apply starting at the given time and lasting for the given duration.

params.name: startTime
params.description: The startTime parameter is the time in the same time coordinate system as AudioContext.currentTime.

params.name: duration
params.description: The duration parameter is the amount of time in seconds (after the time parameter) where values will be calculated according to the values parameter.

classitems.description: Schedules an exponential continuous change in parameter value from the previous scheduled parameter value to the given value.
classitems.name: exponentialRampToValueAtTime

params.name: value
params.description: The value parameter is the value the parameter will exponentially ramp to at the given time.

params.name: endTime
params.description: The endTime parameter is the time in the same time coordinate system as AudioContext.currentTime.

classitems.description: Schedules a linear continuous change in parameter value from the previous scheduled parameter value to the given value.
classitems.name: linearRampToValueAtTime

params.name: value
params.description: The value parameter is the value the parameter will exponentially ramp to at the given time.

params.name: endTime
params.description: The endTime parameter is the time in the same time coordinate system as AudioContext.currentTime.

classitems.description: Schedules a linear continuous change in parameter value from the previous scheduled parameter value to the given value.
classitems.name: cancelScheduledValues

params.name: startTime
params.description: The startTime parameter is the starting time at and after which any previously scheduled parameter changes will be cancelled.
